div.p: There are no upcoming events to display.

strong.br: Midland Academy will be closed through May 1, 2020. Please be patient with us and your child's teacher as we assess this extension of closure. We will continue with instruction as usual until further notice.

span.strong: Is my child required to do their schoolwork while at home during the Coronavirus Quarantine? YES! See letter below!
